sense.def:
Z besedo
maybe
opozorimo, da je nekaj sicer mogoče, nismo pa povsem prepričani o tem.

seg.quote: Maybe he'll be prime minister one day.

sense.def:
Maybe
uporabimo, kadar hočemo opozoriti, da je neko število le približno.

seg.quote: There were maybe half a dozen men there.
He's in his fifties, I'd say. Fifty-five, maybe.
